common_prompt: Liam, a young traveler with short brown hair and blue eyes, wearing a beige jacket over a white t-shirt, sits in a cozy Madrid café. The café has warm lighting, wooden tables, a chalkboard menu in Spanish, and large windows letting in golden sunlight.
negative_common_prompt: No other characters besides the waiter and Liam. No modern technology like laptops or smartphones. No dogs or other animals besides what’s specifically mentioned.

prompts.prompt: Liam is holding a menu with both hands, looking at it curiously.
prompts.negative_prompt: No food or drinks on the table yet. No interaction with the waiter yet.

prompts.prompt: Liam is smiling confidently as he prepares to order, still holding the menu.
prompts.negative_prompt: No coffee or food on the table yet. No waiter in the scene yet.

prompts.prompt: The waiter, wearing a white shirt and black apron, stands next to Liam’s table, listening to his order. Liam is speaking with enthusiasm, making a hand gesture.
prompts.negative_prompt: No food or drinks on the table yet.

prompts.prompt: The waiter raises an eyebrow slightly but nods and writes down the order on a small notepad.
prompts.negative_prompt: No food or drinks on the table yet. No other customers interacting.

prompts.prompt: Liam sits patiently, looking around the café while waiting for his order. His hands are resting on the wooden table.
prompts.negative_prompt: No food or drinks on the table yet.

prompts.prompt: The waiter returns with a tray carrying a steaming cup of coffee and a large plate piled with golden, crispy churros.
prompts.negative_prompt: No other food besides churros and coffee. No exaggerated reactions yet.

prompts.prompt: Liam’s eyes widen in surprise as he looks at the massive plate of churros in front of him. He wasn’t expecting this!
prompts.negative_prompt: No other food besides churros and coffee. No interaction with the waiter yet.

prompts.prompt: The waiter, with a friendly smile, gestures toward the churros and suggests trying them with chocolate.
prompts.negative_prompt: No other customers interacting. No additional dishes on the table.

prompts.prompt: Liam, still surprised but curious, dips a churro into a small cup of chocolate sauce and takes a bite.
prompts.negative_prompt: No excessive mess. No other food besides churros and coffee.

prompts.prompt: Liam’s face lights up with delight as he enjoys the taste of the churro with chocolate.
prompts.negative_prompt: No exaggerated or unrealistic reactions. No other distractions in the café.

prompts.prompt: Liam, now more relaxed, takes a sip of his coffee, still smiling after his unexpected but delicious mistake.
prompts.negative_prompt: No other drinks besides coffee. No other people interacting in the scene.

prompts.prompt: Liam leans back in his chair, satisfied, looking at the churros and realizing this was the best mistake he ever made.
prompts.negative_prompt: No unfinished food on the plate. No distractions in the background.
